[+1450] How Not to Demonstrate Your Car's Auto-Brake Feature
item.description: The official word from Volvo was that there was human error involved in the preparation of the demonstration.

item.title: [+1421] Organic Potatoes FAIL (pic)
item.description: Seriously? The people who are buying organic potatoes in the first place will also be the first ones to balk at this kind of over-done packaging that seems to miss the whole point.

item.title: [+1328] Was Apple right? Adobe Flash crashes twice during mobile dem
item.description: With the spotlight on Adobe Flash for mobile, thanks to Apple's distaste for it, an onstage demo of Flash crashing twice doesn't help the cause.

item.title: [+1259] The Last Man to Play Halo 2 on Xbox Live
item.description: It is Xbox Live member Apache N4SIR. Nearly a month after Microsoft shut down the original Xbox Live, he was one of the Noble 14 who kept their connections running. Their numbers slowly dwindled, and today, he was the last Spartan standing.

item.title: [+1153] Maxim's 2010 Hot 100 List (Lots of Pics)
item.description: Maxim ranks the hottest 100 women in the world, once again. Thank you, Jeebus.

item.title: [+1094] How Facebook Pulled a Privacy Bait and Switch
item.description: When it first arrived on the scene, Facebook's main appeal was how well it protected your personal information. Those days are long gone.

item.title: [+1086] Mama Bear Helps Her Baby Get Out Of Tree
item.description: It appears her baby is stuck up a tree, so she does her best to get him down. Awesome

item.title: [+905] Yoda is Watching [pic]
item.description: May the cumulus be with you.

item.title: [+792] Father creates iPhone app: 'voice' for his disabled daughter
item.description: Ever since his daughter was born with cerebral palsy, Martin Brooks has wished there were an easy way to communicate with her.For years he and his wife have struggled to understand Mia's needs by getting her to look at objects or picture cards. But after buying an iPhone last year, Mr Brooks had an epiphany. Remembering Apple's adverts ...

item.title: [+707] Starving Yogi Trumps His Test Leaving Scientists Spellbound
item.description: An 83-year-old Indian holy man who says he has spent seven decades without food or water has astounded a team of military doctors who studied him during a two-week observation period.

item.title: [+700] More Reasons Why You Should Still Quit Facebook
item.description: The response to the Top Ten Reasons You Should Quit Facebook was huge, although not without objections or doubts. Here are the some definitive answers from Dan Yoder that you should share on your Facebook walls...before disabling your account.

item.title: [+637] Huge scientific instrument built to test Einstein's theory
item.description: Three spacecraft flying three million miles apart are to fire laser beams at each other across the emptiness of space in a bid to finally prove whether a theory proposed by Albert Einstein is correct.Three spacecraft flying three million miles apart ar
